Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities send one or more people though the people sent are not mentioned explicitly to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task
= man, also known as Hezekiah (חִזְקִיָּהוּ) ◄ son of Ahaz (אָחָז) ► father of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= written document; ► composed by government official and used to communicate instructions or information to other people
= causative action by which humans create a written document, such as a letter, book, or song
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of Joseph (יֹוסֵף) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of Joseph (יֹוסֵף) ► founder of tribe of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה)

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= action by which humans come together to exercise their minds as a group to determine how they are going to achieve a particular purpose
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon
= state in which a countable entity is the second in a range

mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= action by which humans perform the rituals that allow them to be in the presence of a deity

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
expression indicating that the number of people engaging in a certain event is insufficient to achieve its purpose
= process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

Node.gloss: to be straight in the eyes (of someone) > to be accepted|to be approved|to please
Node.definition: literally: to be straight in the eyes of someone; hence: = state/process by which humans consider someone or something good

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

m.definition: = town; ◄ located in the Negeb (נֶגֶב) at the southern border of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► used esp. in combination with Dan (דָּן) at the northern border of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) to refer to all Israel

Node.definition: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

= town, also known as Laish (לַיִשׁ) and Leshem (לֶשֶׁם) ◄ located in northern Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) ► first inhabited by Sidonians (צִידֹונִי) but later conquered by Danites (דָּנִי) who renamed it Dan (דָּן) after the founder of their tribe

Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= written document; ► composed by government official and used to communicate instructions or information to other people
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
literally: to turn (to someone); hence: = action by which humans or deities associate with other humans or deities, often to look for or to provide help and support
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= man, also known as Abram (אַבְרָם) ◄ son of Terah (תֶּרַח) ► first patriarch of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) father of Ishmael (יִשְׁמָעֵאל) and Isaac (יִצְחָק)
= man; ◄ son of Abraham (אַבְרָהָם) and Sarah (שָׂרָה) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) father of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and Jacob (יַעֲקֹב)

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
literally: to turn (to someone); hence: = action by which humans or deities associate with other humans or deities, often to look for or to provide help and support

literally: palm of the hand, with the focus on one of the activities that are performed with the hands: to hold someone against that person's will; = condition of being under the malevolent control of another person or group
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= nation; ◄ located in Northern Mesopotamia with Nineveh (נִינְוֵה) as its capital; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)
= indirect male progenitor
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to commit a violation|to be unfaithful
Node.definition: = to do something that is not in line with the behavior that one has committed oneself to
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= indirect male progenitor
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= referent to a group of male (and female) participants that are addressed if a discourse

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= a marker indicating that an important statement is following and demanding the attention of the listener

Node.gloss: to be stubborn|to be stiff necked
Node.definition: literally: to harden one's neck, heart; = action by which humans show themselves to be stubborn and unwilling to yield
= indirect male progenitor
literally: to give (one's) hand (to someone); hence: = action by which humans accept the authority of other humans, or of a deity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= place that has been consecrated to a deity, where that deity is said to reside and is worshiped
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action by which humans or deities set apart humans or objects for a particular purpose or activity relating to the service of God, as a result of which they become holy (קָדֹושׁ)
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

= action by which humans, either as individuals or as groups, assume a position of subservience towards a deity, perform the required rituals, and live in accordance with the requirements of that deity

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

Node.gloss: to turn away|to come to an end|to cease|to subside
Node.definition: literally: (an event) turns away (from someone); hence: = process by which a certain condition comes to an end
literally: kindling of anger; hence: = process by which the anger (אַף) of deities is aroused ◄ like a fire that is kindled
= state of extreme displeasure; ≈ often associated with fire and smoke
literally: to turn (to someone); hence: = action by which humans or deities associate with other humans or deities, often to look for or to provide help and support
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= state in which humans feel compassion for others, ◄ caused by affection for that person and/or the lack of well being of that person; ► this feeling is usually translated into action
= a person or entity ► that forcibly carries off an animal, person, or group
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= state in which deities are favorably disposed to someone, or of experiencing an emotion of compassion towards other people, and acting accordingly
= state in which deities feel compassion for humans, ► which is usually translated into action
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
literally: to turn (to someone); hence: = action by which humans or deities associate with other humans or deities, often to look for or to provide help and support

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ tenth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and sixth son of Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel
literally: to laugh (at someone); hence: = action by which humans or deities express their lack of respect for (other) humans, often accompanied by laughter
only used in poetry; = action by which humans or deities express their disdain of others with words, sounds and/or gestures
= particle marking a constituent as representing a limited number of entities
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ eighth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Zilpah (זִלְפָּה) slave of Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of Joseph (יֹוסֵף) ► founder of tribe of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה)

= action by which humans show a low estimate of their own importance, usually before a deity
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

literally: hand; hence: = action by which humans or deities exert strength and power
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= state in which a countable entity is one in number

= red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of life (נֶפֶשׁ) human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans and deities have character, integrity, and good fortune
= action by which deities do not hold wrongdoers any longer responsible for certain actions, often as a result of an atonement ritual or a change in behavior of the guilty party

Node.gloss: for the sake of|for the benefit of
Node.definition: = relation denoting that someone performs a certain event for the benefit of someone or something else
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

Node.gloss: to be committed (to someone or something)
Node.definition: literally: to direct (one's) heart
= action where humans make an intensive effort to associate with a deity, to serve and worship him, and to get answers to questions
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= indirect male progenitor
= process by which people become free from contamination, ► as a result of which they can interact socially with others
= the tabernacle or temple of YHWH, described in terms of its holiness
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man, also known as Hezekiah (חִזְקִיָּהוּ) ◄ son of Ahaz (אָחָז) ► father of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)

= causative action by which humans or deities help or cause (other) humans to be restored to health or physical strength after a disease or an accident; this could also refer to the wound or disease itself

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
literally: to be found (in a place); hence: = state in which humans or objects are located in a certain place
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= celebration, usually of a religious nature; ≈ associated with joy
= thin cracker like bread made without yeast
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which humans feel and show great joy
= state in which an event has a high intensity
= action by which humans or divine beings express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to (other) humans or deities about who they are and what they do
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
= state in which a person, supernatural being, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man, also known as Hezekiah (חִזְקִיָּהוּ) ◄ son of Ahaz (אָחָז) ► father of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties

Node.gloss: to be wise|to have understanding|to be skilled
Node.definition: = state in which humans have the ability to understand things
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a festival that is celebrated at fixed times
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense

Node.gloss: to confess|to make confession|to praise|to give praise
Node.definition: = action by which humans publicly admit their own shortcomings before God, or the shortcomings of the people they represent|= action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= indirect male progenitor
= action by which humans come together to exercise their minds as a group to determine how they are going to achieve a particular purpose

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= pertaining to being different from other objects and events that are in the same range

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which humans feel and show great joy
= man, also known as Jehizkiah (יְחִזְקִיָּה) ◄ son of Ahaz (אָחָז) ► father of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
literally: to lift up; hence: = causative action by which humans devote certain things to a deity
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= young male bovine; ► clean, used as sacrifice; ≈ associated with power and strength, but also with violence and aggression and therefore often used to denote people who behave as such
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times

= group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
literally: to lift up; hence: = causative action by which humans devote certain things to a deity
= young male bovine; ► clean, used as sacrifice; ≈ associated with power and strength, but also with violence and aggression and therefore often used to denote people who behave as such
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times

= group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= action by which humans perform the rituals that allow them to be in the presence of a deity
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= state in which humans live in a place which is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker classes within the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the widows, the fatherless, and other people who are poor

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= state in which humans feel and show great joy
= state in which an event has a high intensity
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► king of Judah and Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) given the name Jedidiah (יְדִידְיָהּ) at his birth
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= action by which humans speak to a deity, often by raising their hands, ► requesting help or expressing their thankfulness
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day
